metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0554 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Use of Out-of-range Pointer Offset in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 8.2.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0554` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.14
vim-athena - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.14
vim-common - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.14
vim-gtk - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.14
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.14
vim-gui-common - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.14
vim-nox - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.14
vim-runtime - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.14
vim-tiny - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.14
xxd - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.14
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.14').
